Class ReleasesController

java.lang.Object
app.releases.ReleasesController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/releases") public class ReleasesController extends Object
Controller to manage release-related operations. Provides endpoints for retrieving, saving, deleting, and filtering release data.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReleasesController

      @Autowired public ReleasesController(ReleasesService releasesService)
      Constructor for the controller. Initializes the release service and populates the list of fields in the Releases class.
      Parameters:
      releasesService - the service used to manage release data.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Releases> findAll(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="20") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="Id") String sortParam, @RequestParam(defaultValue="ASC") String sortDirection)
      Retrieves a paginated and sorted list of releases.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to retrieve (default 0).
      size - the number of items per page (default 20).
      sortParam - the field to sort by (default "Id").
      sortDirection - the sorting direction ("ASC" or "DESC", default "ASC").
      Returns:
      a page containing the list of releases.

    • getReleaseById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Releases getReleaseById(@PathVariable Integer id)
      Retrieves a release by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the release.
      Returns:
      the release object.

    • getReleasesByCountry

      @GetMapping("/country") public List<Releases> getReleasesByCountry(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="Unknown") String country)
      Retrieves releases based on the specified country.
      Parameters:
      country - the name of the country (default "Unknown").
      Returns:
      a list of releases associated with the specified country.

    • getReleasesByMoviesId

      @GetMapping("/movie") public List<Releases> getReleasesByMoviesId(@RequestParam(required=true) Integer movieId)
      Retrieves releases by a specific movie ID.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie.
      Returns:
      a list of releases associated with the given movie ID.

    • getReleasesByTypeAndCountry

      @GetMapping("/type") public List<Releases> getReleasesByTypeAndCountry(@RequestParam(required=false) String type, @RequestParam(required=false) String country)
      Retrieves releases filtered by type and country.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of release (required).
      country - the country of release (required).
      Returns:
      a list of releases matching the type and country filters.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the type or country parameters are null.

    • getReleasesByRatingOrderedByDate

      @GetMapping("/rating") public List<Releases> getReleasesByRatingOrderedByDate(@RequestParam String rating)
      Retrieves releases filtered by rating, ordered by date.
      Parameters:
      rating - the rating to filter by.
      Returns:
      a list of releases matching the specified rating.

    • saveRelease

      @PostMapping public Releases saveRelease(@RequestBody Releases release)
      Saves a new release to the database.
      Parameters:
      release - the release object to save.
      Returns:
      the saved release.

    • deleteRelease

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deleteRelease(@PathVariable Integer id)
      Deletes a release by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the release to delete.
